actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A resolution relating to the restoration and use, as the City Museum of the District of Columbia, or a related appropriate public or commercial purpose, of the former Masonic Hall at Ninth and F streets Northwest, Washington, District of Columbia.

summary.text: Expresses the interest, concern, and support of the House for the retention and continued use of the Masonic Hall building in downtown Washington, D.C.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the restoration and use, as the City Museum of the District of Columbia, or a related appropriate public or commercial purpose, of the former Masonic Hall at Ninth and F streets Northwest, Washington, District of Columbia.
